! all lengths and dimensions in cm
! scales are relative to default font height hei=0.3633 cm

graphWidth = 10.7
graphHeight = graphWidth/ratio

titleDist = 0.1
titleScale = 1
axisLabelDist = 0.1
axisLabelScale = 1
axisTitleDist = axisLabelDist+titleDist
axisTitleScale = 1

colorbarDist = 0.2

axisWidth = 0.05
lineWidth = 0.04
markerSize = 0.12

keyHei = 0.3
keyDist = 0.1
keyMargins = 0.12
keyLineLength = 0.4
keyColDist = 0.4

xres = 150.0000/2.54*graphWidth 
yres = 150.0000/2.54*graphHeight
